resources.string: Make sure your password has at least 7 characters, and at least one capital letter and number
Account with this username already exists
This username contains a banned word, pick another
Failed to connect to server, please check your internet connection

How do I start a game?: You can start a solo game by clicking play, or play against an opponent with Play With Friends.

How do I change my password? You can change your password in the setting page, along with changing in-game settings such as your sound.

How do I chat with friends? You can post to the global chat room to talk with everyone, post in your own chat room to talk to your friends or assigned chat mates, or post on your friends pages to talk with them.

How is the game scored? Players are given no points for a wrong answer, and (10 - time taken) points for a correct answer. For example, a 4 second answer would be worth 10 - 4 = 6 points

App Credits: Mike Ostrowka, Tanner Langan, Randy Gill, Jaden Yu

Tools Used: Realm Database, MongoDB
